text: Memoirs is the fourth and final studio album by The 3rd and the Mortal. The album was released on May 7, 2002. ==Track listing== # "Zeppoliner" – 5:54 # "Good Evening Mr. Q" – 5:22 # "The City" – 6:00 # "Reflections" – 4:43 # "Thin Dark Line" – 6:40 # "Fools like Us" – 4:25 # "Those of My Kind" – 5:37 # "Simple Minds" – 6:52 # "Spider" – 5:05 ==References== Category:2002 albums
title: Memoirs
